name: Castles (itch) (Sammy Fischer)
description:
Destroy your enemy's castle using whichever troops and spells the cards give you.

Currently super stupid AI which just play random cards in random lanes, only 3 troop types and 5 spell, no UI to speak of. The game ends whenever one of the castles is destroyed. To restart you need to exit the game (ESC) and restart the whole game (the start a new game button doesn't work yet ... something something null reference )
